title: Pike and Shot: Campaings
notes:
Without workarounds the launcher lauches the game to a black screen.
To get it to work properly firstly launch the game and wait for the black screen.
Then go to
~/<your steam folder>/steamapps/campatdata/377520/pfx/drive_c/users/steamusuer/My Documents/My Games/PSCAMP/
In there create a file named OPTIONS.txt, in it insert the contents of this pastebin: http://pastebin.com/i67SB7jE. Change the resolution to your liking.

After that you have to configure wine using this in a terminal:
WINEPREFIX="<your steam folder>/steamapps/compatdata/377520/pfx"; winecfg

In the configuration go to the "Libraries tab", then add "dbghelp" (without quotes) to the overrides list, using the "edit" button, set it to wine (builtin).
Click "OK", then launch the game. 

Everything should run smoothly.
I followed the detailed guy of the lad  above and it works perfectly!
title: Pike and Shot : Campaigns
